projects.name: The Home Project

Prototyped in Figma, built using Next.js 14 and hosted on Vercel, with photos mostly taken with a [Fujifilm x100f](https://www.amazon.ca/Fujifilm-X100F-APS-C-Digital-Camera-Silver/dp/B01N33CT3Z?th=1)

projects.name: Timeline
